attributes.action: give pensioners free council tax and dental care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that pensioners should be allowed to recieve full rebate on council tax,free dental care ...they have worked all their life to save for pension age and should be allowed to recieve benefits such as council tax and free dental care, i think the savings should be set at £100k .......let them enjoy their latter years, with out worry.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
